English: I am learning to speak French.
The weather is nice this afternoon.
French: Le temps est agréable cet après-midi.

English: Can you help me with my homework?
My family is going on vacation next week.
French: Ma famille part en vacances la semaine prochaine.
Ce restaurant a de la nourriture délicieuse.

English: How do you say 'Good morning' in French?
I need to go to the bank. Do you know where it is?
French: J'ai besoin d'aller à la banque. Tu sais où elle est ?
